short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for Zano wallet app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zano Companion is an intuitive browser extension designed to enhance your web browsing by seamlessly integrating your Zano wallet with web applications. Connect your wallet directly to websites to perform secure transactions and interact with privacy oriented decentralized applications effortlessly. Manage your confidential assets conveniently and securely, and enjoy a user-friendly interface designed for optimal digital currency management. Unlock the full potential of your online interactions with Zano Companion.
